name: Monkey King Simulator -- Chapter Huaguo Mountain
name_original: Monkey King Simulator -- Chapter Huaguo Mountain
description:
ShiningCloud Studio（Though only myself-。-）Presents！

Game Designer：inkmoon

UE4 Programing：inkmoon

Art & Sound & Model & Animation Resources：UE marketplace

————



Developer was a mobile game designer.

A year ago, Black Myth Wukong released its trailer.

After that, I decided to quit my job and learn UE4 engine.

The study process is tough, but also productive and full of fun!

So I try to finish this game.

A year later, the Monkey King Simulator -- Chapter Huaguo Mountain is here now!

There many awesome games nowadays, but not interesting(for me).

This game is not awesome, but I do have some fun playing it!

Farm, Loot, Operation, Timing, Combination Strategy,

You can build the battle style in your own way!

Next I plan to update a new map and new difficulties for free, depends on when players clear the most difficult level. And of course, fix bugs.

Thank You For Playing!

Good Luck & Have Fun!
